product_name: Zoic Grove Plaid Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Zoic Grove Plaid Bike Shorts for men easily take you around town or hiking a trail, yet are ready to hop on a bike at a moment's notice. Stretchy, partially recycled polyester/spandex fabric lets you move freely. Gusset inseam provides superior range of motion and eliminates seat hang-ups. Tech pocket with cord port holds a cell phone or music player. Flat front waistband offers belt loops, snap closure and zip fly. Zoic Grove Plaid Bike Shorts have hand pockets, 2 back pockets and 1 cargo-style thigh pocket.
short_description: Zoic Grove Plaid Bike Shorts for men easily take you around town or hiking a trail, yet are ready to hop on a bike at a moment's notice.
